title: Porn or horror movie?
review: My bf and I played this game for the first 45 mins - is it a soft porn of horror movie? This movie was so bad we couldn't stop watching, but believe me it is an hour and 20 mins of your life you will never get back. Horrible acting and story line. I swore Dracula was going to ask the girl for a green card and a chiropractor.

title: This was pathetic...
review: Smh. Every single person involved with this movie should be embarrassed.

title: At first I wasn't sure if this was parody or just simply bad.
review: After about 25 minutes I figured it it was plain bad.
